On Dec 20, 2007, at 4:37 AM, Steve Loughran wrote:

> If we are going to have clients and servers that are less brittle than
> their previous generations, and yet which are still easy for people to
> code for, I think we need to move beyond java/C#.

+1. The Web and the static world view of these languages simply don't  
match.

Stefan
--
Stefan Tilkov, http://www.innoq.com/blog/st/
